Text.Page:
The worst thing isn't dying, it's dying of the plague. You can't be resurrected. You just rise up as one of those horrid wraiths.

The biggest threat comes from those {@LinkCreature:28#2021#plagued cullars} and {@LinkCreature:28#2031#plagued tentacullars}. If you could kill a bunch, that would be a real boon to the rest of us.

You were successful? I don't see any gray lines around your eyes or ichor oozing from your ears.

Presumably that means you're safe.

By all means, please take your reward and my thanks.
